resources.string: Describe the bug in one sentence

Describe your bug in details, with the playback steps, expected result and your actual result.

For example:
1. Open App
2. Connect Flipper
3. Open "Archive" tab
4. Press to "Sub-Ghz" category

Expected result: I see my Sub-GHz keys
Actual result: App crashes

We are very ashamed that you had problems with the application. Please document the bug on the forum. There are detailed instructions on how to do it: [https://docs.flipperzero.one/mobile-app/bug-report](https://docs.flipperzero.one/mobile-app/bug-report) \n\nAfter that, we can take care of it. Also please check the bug in dev/beta version of the application. If it does not reproduce, then it is already fixed
Check the bug in Dev/Beta version of the app. If it doesnâ€™t reproduce, then we have already fixed it.
You can also post your bug on our forum so we can fix it faster. [Here is the instruction how to do it.](https://flipp.dev/mobile-app-bug-report)
Unable to report bug from the app. Try again later or post your bug on our forum so we can fix it faster. [Here is the instruction how to do it.](https://flipp.dev/mobile-app-bug-report)
